name: Ext_R5_DetectedIssue_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DetectedIssue.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DetectedIssue.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DetectedIssue|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Indicates the subject whose record the detected issue is associated with.
element.comment: `DetectedIssue.subject` maps to R4B `DetectedIssue.patient`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Location)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Practitioner)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
